00018 #ifndef ELLIPSE_H
00019 #define ELLIPSE_H
00020 
00021 #include "object.h"
00022 
00023 #include "object.h"
00024 #include "coordinate.h"
00025 
00030 class Ellipse : public Object  {
00031 protected:
00032         int subType;                                            // 1: ellipse defined by radii,
00033                                                                                                         // 2: ellipse defined by diameters,
00034                                                                                                         // 3: circle defined by radius,
00035                                                                                                         // 4: circle defined by diameter
00036         int direction;                                  // allways 1
00037         float angle;                                            // radians, angle of X-axis
00038         Coordinate *center;
00039         Coordinate *radii;
00040         Coordinate *start, *end;
00041         
00042         void setSubType(int subType) { this->subType = subType; }
00043         
00044 public:
00045         Ellipse();
00046         ~Ellipse();
00047         
00048         int getSubType() { return subType; }
00049         void setAngle(float angle) { this->angle = angle; }
00050         float getAngle() { return angle; }
00051         void setCenter(Coordinate *center) { this->center = center; }
00052         Coordinate * getCenter() { return center; }
00053         void setRadii(Coordinate *radius) { this->radii = radii; }
00054         Coordinate * getRadii() { return radii; }
00055         void setStart(Coordinate *start) { this->start = start; }
00056         Coordinate * getStart() { return start; }
00057         void setEnd(Coordinate *end) { this->end = end; }
00058         Coordinate * getEnd() { return end; }
00059         
00060         void write(std::ostream &stream) const;
00061 };
00062         
00063 inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &stream, const Ellipse & o) {
00064         o.write(stream);
00065         return stream;
00066 }

00068 #endif
